name: Ramsha
greetingText: you will always be my nomm nomm face
wishText: being with you for so long i have pissed you off and anoyed the hell out of you but i have also made you feel loved and tongith i want you to know i will  continue to piss you off but also work harder to be with you there is nothing more that could make me happy then coming home and you runing into my arms. tongith is special becouse it marks a very importent message to us that no amount of pain and strugel ever stoped us and i have no regrets or secound thonghts that i ablslulty love you even when i am not able to show that love and when i come shourt on my part i cant tell you how much i apprechate you and see your stucgels in being with me so i wanna rase a glass to you my love for puting up with me and loveing me but honesstly i generally love you and i am only yours and yours only forever i love you Ramsha and Happy aniversry and happy Valentine's night
